Literature.Title: Legume Plant Peptides as Sources of Novel Antimicrobial Molecules Against Human Pathogens.
Literature.Author: Lima RM, Rathod BB, Tiricz H, Howan DHO, Al Bouni MA, Jenei S, Timar E, Endre G, Tóth GK, Kondorosi É

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MBC=12.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus HNCMO 112011(MBC=6.25µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19111(MBC=6.25µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MBC=3.125µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae NCTC 13440(no activity data),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis ATCC 13076(MBC=25µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=3.125µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MBC=3.125µM)
